languages.text: "К чему лить кровь? Может, подчиним тварь вместе и попытаемся извлечь общую выгоду?"
"There is no need for bloodshed. Why don't we try to derive some mutual benefit by taming this creature together?"
languages.original_text: "К чему лить кровь? Может, подчиним тварь вместе и попытаемся извлечь общую выгоду?"

traits.locale_text: "There's no need for bloodshed. Maybe we can try to derive some mutual benefits by taming this creature together?"
"There's no need for bloodshed. Maybe we can try to derive some mutual benefits by taming this creature together?"
"There's no need for bloodshed. How about we try to derive some mutual benefits by taming this creature together?"
"There's no need for bloodshed. How about we try to derive some mutual benefits by taming this creature together?"
"There is no need for bloodshed. Why don't we try to derive some mutual benefit by taming this creature together?"
"There is no need for bloodshed. Why don't we try to derive some mutual benefit by taming this creature together?"

languages.text: « Inutile de faire couler le sang. Nous pourrions dominer cette créature ensemble et tenter d'en tirer un avantage mutuel. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need for bloodshed. Why don't we try to derive some mutual benefit by taming this creature together?"

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de faire couler le sang. Nous pourrions dominer cette créature ensemble et tenter d'en tirer un avantage mutuel. »

languages.text: «No hay necesidad de que esto acabe con sangre. ¿Y si tratamos de beneficiarnos todos de tener a esta criatura domada?».
languages.original_text: "There is no need for bloodshed. Why don't we try to derive some mutual benefit by taming this creature together?"

traits.locale_text: «No hay necesidad de que esto acabe con sangre. ¿Por qué no tratamos de beneficiarnos todos de tener a esta criatura domada?».

languages.text: “我们没必要发生流血冲突。不如我们一起来驯服这只怪物，实现共同的利益吧？”
languages.original_text: "There is no need for bloodshed. Why don't we try to derive some mutual benefit by taming this creature together?"

traits.locale_text: “我们没必要发生流血冲突。不如我们一起来驯服这只怪物，获得共同的利益吧？”

languages.text: "Es ist kein Blutvergießen nötig. Versuchen wir doch, diese Kreatur gemeinsam zu zähmen und beide davon zu profitieren, was sagt Ihr?"
languages.original_text: "There is no need for bloodshed. Why don't we try to derive some mutual benefit by taming this creature together?"

traits.locale_text: "Es ist kein Blutvergießen nötig. Überlegen wir doch, wie wir beide davon profitieren können, wenn wir diese Kreatur gemeinsam zähmen, was sagt Ihr?"

languages.text: 「血を流す必要はない。一緒にこの生き物を手なずけることで、共に利益を得るというのはどうだ？」
languages.original_text: "There is no need for bloodshed. Why don't we try to derive some mutual benefit by taming this creature together?"

traits.locale_text: 「血を流す必要はない。一緒にこの生き物を手なずけることで、共に利益を得るというのはどうだ？」

languages.text: "Kan dökmenin manası yok. Bu canavarı birlikte ehlîleştirip ikimizin de yararına olacak bir çözüm bulmaya çalışsak nasıl olur?"
languages.original_text: "There is no need for bloodshed. Why don't we try to derive some mutual benefit by taming this creature together?"
